verses.esv: 5 As I was considering, behold, a male goat came from the west across the face of the whole earth, without touching the ground. And the goat had a conspicuous horn between his eyes.
verses.kjv: 5 And as I was considering, behold, an he goat came from the west on the face of the whole earth, and touched not the ground: and the goat had a notable horn between his eyes.
verses.niv: 5 As I was thinking about this, suddenly a goat with a prominent horn between his eyes came from the west, crossing the whole earth without touching the ground.

verses.esv:
8   God brings him out of Egypt
    and is for him like the horns of the wild ox;
  he shall eat up the nations, his adversaries,
    and shall break their bones in pieces
    and pierce them through with his arrows.
verses.kjv: 8 God brought him forth out of Egypt; he hath as it were the strength of an unicorn: he shall eat up the nations his enemies, and shall break their bones, and pierce them through with his arrows.
verses.niv: 8 "God brought them out of Egypt; they have the strength of a wild ox. They devour hostile nations and break their bones in pieces; with their arrows they pierce them.

verses.esv:
14   Then the LORD will appear over them,
    and his arrow will go forth like lightning;
  the Lord GOD will sound the trumpet
    and will march forth in the whirlwinds of the south.
verses.kjv: 14 And the LORD shall be seen over them, and his arrow shall go forth as the lightning: and the LORD GOD shall blow the trumpet, and shall go with whirlwinds of the south.
verses.niv: 14 Then the LORD will appear over them; his arrow will flash like lightning. The Sovereign LORD will sound the trumpet; he will march in the storms of the south,

verses.esv:
10   But you have exalted my horn like that of the wild ox;
    you have poured over me fresh oil.
verses.kjv: 10 But my horn shalt thou exalt like the horn of an unicorn: I shall be anointed with fresh oil.
verses.niv: 10 You have exalted my horn like that of a wild ox; fine oils have been poured upon me.

verses.esv:
22   God brings them out of Egypt
    and is for them like the horns of the wild ox.
verses.kjv: 22 God brought them out of Egypt; he hath as it were the strength of an unicorn.
verses.niv: 22 God brought them out of Egypt; they have the strength of a wild ox.

verses.esv:
10   Can you bind him in the furrow with ropes,
    or will he harrow the valleys after you?
verses.kjv: 10 Canst thou bind the unicorn with his band in the furrow? or will he harrow the valleys after thee?
verses.niv: 10 Can you hold him to the furrow with a harness? Will he till the valleys behind you?
